theses.description: Array of thesis statements generated for the organization

contrarian_level.description: The contrarian level (1-10) this thesis belongs to. 1 = mainstream industry view, 10 = radically contrarian, boundary-pushing perspective.

thesis_html.description: The actual thesis statement or headline, formatted as HTML. MUST use ONLY valid HTML tags (e.g., <strong>, <em>). NEVER use Markdown syntax. It should be a short, punchy sentence or headline that captures the unique perspective.

thesis_supporting_evidence_html.description: One sentence explaining the evidence or credibility behind this thesis and why this organization/leader is the best to speak on it. MUST use ONLY valid HTML tags. NEVER use Markdown syntax. Reference specific content, data, or experience.
